sources.title: The Dominant Sex
sources.description: A mature comedy – based on the hit stage play – in which a loving but strained marriage is put to the test!

metadata.Plot: I can only assume that the previous reviewer was unaware of the existence of quota quickies.Associated British would need economically made films like this to comply with their renter and exhibitor quotas.So if he was expecting an MGM style production no wonder he was disappointed.To me it was an interesting view of relationships between men and women in the late thirties.Music hall comedian Billy Milton has a small role.I had no great expectations of this and so was not disappointed.
metadata.Writer: Michael Egan, John Fernald, Vina de Vesci
metadata.Actors: Phillips Holmes, Diana Churchill, Romney Brent
